dcterms:creator: Vlad Niculae
Joonsuk Park
Claire Cardie
dcterms:description: The Cornell eRulemaking Corpus (CDCP) consists of 731 user comments from an eRulemaking website, totaling about 4,700 propositions, all considered to be argumentative. The argument model adopted is based on directed graphs, with propositions divided into five classes: POLICY, VALUE, FACT, TESTIMONY, and REFERENCE.
dcterms:title: Cornell eRulemaking Corpus (CDCP)
